title.native: ループ7回目の悪役令嬢は、元敵国で自由気ままな花嫁生活を満喫する
title.romaji: Loop 7-kaime no Akuyaku Reijou wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyuu Kimama na Hanayome Seikatsu wo Mankitsu Suru
title.english: 7th Time Loop: The Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!

description:
Rishe Irmgard Weitzner, a duke's daughter, has a secret: she died at the age of 20 and returned to the moment five years prior when her engagement was called off. She has already experienced this time loop six times and lived out those five years a different way each time, as a merchant, a doctor, a maid, a knight, and more. Now, on her seventh go-around, she's determined to live to a ripe old age and spend it relaxing. But the moment she flees the castle with that decision in her heart, she runs into the infamously cruel crown prince of a rival kingdom, Arnold Hein. He happens to be the one who killed her during her life as a knight, but now, he seems to have taken a bizarre liking to her... and begs her to become his wife. Thus, in order to stay alive and prevent a war, Rishe utilizes her previous experiences to kick off her seventh life as the bride of an enemy nation's crown prince.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ชีวิตลูปที่ 7 ของนางร้าย ขอเป็นเจ้าสาวนอนกลิ้งสบายในแดนอดีตศัตรู
Седьмая беззаботная жизнь злодейки в браке со злейшим врагом

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Time Loop
tags.description: A character is stuck in a repetitive cycle that they are attempting to break out of. This is distinct from a manipulating time of their own choice.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Alchemy
tags.description: Features character(s) who practice alchemy.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Horticulture
tags.description: The story prominently features plant care and gardening.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

node.description:
__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

Houno Satoshi is a Japanese composer and arranger, affiliated with Sound Drive.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_hono)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/BNRY_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/thebinary_official/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCavdjylCke3KvJNCCxjZiCg) | [Website](https://the-bnry.com)

A Japanese utaite duo consisting of Mido and Akamaru (あかまる).

**Height:** 172 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokishunichi) | [Official Website](http://tokishunichi.com/) | [Agency Profile](http://www.withline.jp/talent/?id=shunichi_toki)

**Non-Anime Roles**
• Rui Kamishiro (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)
• Freminet (Genshin Impact)
• X (Reverse: 1999)
